title: Graves autos causing huge flashes of light
body:
exactly what it says on the tin. not sure if it's only on pool party graves, since that's the only skin i've encountered the bug on. it only happened late game, too, so it might be a bug with the particle effect of a certain item + pool party graves. but yeah, the flashes of light are _massive_; about the size of his ult, so maybe it's a bug with level 16 + certain item or level 16 + pool party graves.

either way, i legit felt like i was getting flashbanged every single auto. graves already has a smoke; he doesn't need any more tactical grenades. Kappa

replies.body:
Hey Toasted Pigeon,

Thanks for the report! This is occurring with all skins and the base. We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it.
its not only pool party it happened when i attacked baron as normal graves as well .-.
